price: E, com efeito, concedemo-te sete versículos dos reiterativos e o magnífico Alcorão.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَٰكَ سَبۡعٗا مِّنَ ٱلۡمَثَانِي وَٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ ٱلۡعَظِيمَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: walaqad ātaynāka sabʿan mina al-mathānī wal-qur'āna al-ʿaẓīma
